message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, then we can negotiate from there!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm looking to get a bigger share for my efforts!
That's a bit too skewed towards your favor, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but 70% is too much. Let's try again!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I think 40% is a fair compromise. What do you say?
I'll take 60, it's a fair split, but I'm not going to give you more!
Alright, Bob, I'll accept your offer. 60/40 it is. Let's finalize the deal!
